description: A Frappe Framework instance can function as an OAuth Client, Resource, or Authorization server. This DocType contains settings related to all three.

fields.description: These settings are used when this Frappe instance functions as a resource server.
fields.label: Resource Server

fields.description: Human-readable name intended for display to the end user.
fields.label: Resource Name

fields.description: URL of a human-readable page with info that developers might need.
fields.label: Resource Documentation

fields.description: URL of human-readable page with info on requirements about how the client can use the data.
fields.label: Resource Policy URI

fields.description: URL of human-readable page with info about the protected resource's terms of service.
fields.label: Resource TOS URI

fields.description: Allows clients to fetch metadata from the /.well-known/oauth-authorization-server endpoint.
fields.label: Show Auth Server Metadata

fields.description: Allows clients to fetch metadata from the /.well-known/oauth-protected-resource endpoint.
fields.label: Show Protected Resource Metadata

fields.description: New line separated list of scope values.
fields.label: Scopes Supported

fields.description: Allows clients to register themselves without manual intervention. Registration creates a OAuth Client entry.
fields.label: Enable Dynamic Client Registration

name: OAuth Settings
